question: The Marylebone Cricket Club (MCC) has offered honourary life membership to which Indian women cricket player?
explanation: The Marylebone Cricket Club (MCC) has offered honourary life membership to Sandhya Agarwal, former captain of the Indian women's Test team. Agarwal is being honoured in recognition of her distinguished service to the game. She has played 13 Tests and 21 ODIs from 1984 to 1995.
